column1:
SlovenianBrick,"2016-08-20T18:12:28.063Z","71012-0 LEGO Disney Minifigures","

Hello everyone SlovenianBrick here and today I will be doing a review of the all 18 LEGO Disney Minifigures.So let'
So you get one minifigure in one blind bag with some other parts.
So every minfigure has nice printing and all of them are exclusive
column2: and some of them have some tools with them.

column1: You also get some plates to put your minifigs
Overall this is one really good theme of LEGO Minifigures.This is all for this review.About my LEGO Minifigures
column2: reviews soon I will be doing a review of LEGO Minifigures German Football Team an bunch of other sets.See you later.SlovenianBrick.
